name: Biblioteca Magnasco
body:
Biblioteca Magnasco connects nonprofits around the world to a network of open and sustainable ideas and impact.

Our technological focus is on empowering communities through simple, safe, and reliable hardware and software for easy collaboration. All of our software is free and open source; we try to achieve this with our hardware solutions as well, to the extent cost permits.

We design easy-to-use technological solutions for nonprofits, research labs, journalists...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
